languages.text: "Пустотнорожденная... знаете, в моем семейном кругу таких созданий пускали на дичь во время праздничной охоты. Мутанты — бич Человечества, незримая опухоль, которая портит весь наш род... впрочем, я забываюсь. За то непродолжительное время, что Толиман занимает пост Мастера вокса, я не заметил за ней значительных изъянов характера или существенных пробелов в специализации. Она, безусловно, очень исполнительна, как любой пустотнорожденный, стремящийся заслужить любовь хозяина. Полагаю, ее навыкам и преданности можно довериться".

traits.locale_text: "Я не заметил за ней значительных изъянов характера. Она, безусловно, очень исполнительна, как любой, кто недавно занял важный пост. Думаю, что у нее есть все качества для того, чтобы образцово выполнять свои обязанности".

languages.text: "Ah, yes, the voidborn... You know, in my family, we used such creatures as quarry whenever we went hunting. Mutants are the bane of Humanity, an unseen tumour that threatens to end us all... But I digress. In the brief time Toliman has spent in post as Vox Master, I have not noticed any significant flaws in her character or anything that would make me question her professional qualities. Needless to say, she is very diligent, as is any voidborn seeking to earn their master's affection. I believe you can trust in her skills and loyalty."

Over the brief time Toliman spent in the chair of the Vox Master I did not notice any significant flaws in her character or anything that would make me question her professional qualities. Needless to say, she is very diligent, like any voidborn that seeks to earn their master's affection. I guess you can trust her skills and loyalty."

languages.text: “噢，没错，那位虚空之子……说实话，每当我的家族进行狩猎的时候，都会用虚空之子来充当猎物。变种人是人类的祸根，他们是看不见的毒瘤，会威胁所有人的安全……但我想说的是，在托里曼担任音阵大师的短暂期间里，我并没有发现她的性格有任何重大缺陷，也没有发现任何足以让我质疑她职业素养的问题。毋庸置疑，她非常勤奋，会通过努力工作来得到主人的赏识。我相信，您可以信任她的忠诚与技艺。”
languages.original_text: "Ah, yes, the voidborn... You know, in my family, we used such creatures as quarry whenever we went hunting. Mutants are the bane of Humanity, an unseen tumour that threatens to end us all... But I digress. In the brief time Toliman has spent in post as Vox Master, I have not noticed any significant flaws in her character or anything that would make me question her professional qualities. Needless to say, she is very diligent, as is any voidborn seeking to earn their master's affection. I believe you can trust in her skills and loyalty."

traits.locale_text: “噢，没错，那位虚空之子……说实话，每当我的家族进行狩猎的时候，都会用虚空之子来充当猎物。变种人是人类的祸根，他们是看不见的毒瘤，会威胁所有人的安全……但我想说的是，在托里曼担任音阵大师的短暂期间里，我并没有发现她的性格有任何重大缺陷，也没有发现任何足以让我质疑她职业素养的问题。毋庸置疑，她非常勤奋，会通过努力工作来得到主人的赏识。我相信，您可以信任她的忠诚与技艺。”

languages.text: «Ah, sí, la nacida en el vacío... ¿Sabe? En mi familia usábamos a criaturas como esa como presas en nuestras cacerías. Los mutantes son la perdición de la humanidad, un cáncer invisible que amenaza nuestra propia existencia... pero estoy divagando. En el breve período durante el que Toliman ha ejercido de maestra de vocos, no he detectado ningún defecto personal ni nada que me haga cuestionar sus cualificaciones personales. Es muy diligente, como cualquier otro nacido en el vacío que busca ganarse el afecto de su amo. Creo que puede confiar en sus habilidades y en su lealtad».
languages.original_text: "Ah, yes, the voidborn... You know, in my family, we used such creatures as quarry whenever we went hunting. Mutants are the bane of Humanity, an unseen tumour that threatens to end us all... But I digress. In the brief time Toliman has spent in post as Vox Master, I have not noticed any significant flaws in her character or anything that would make me question her professional qualities. Needless to say, she is very diligent, as is any voidborn seeking to earn their master's affection. I believe you can trust in her skills and loyalty."

traits.locale_text: «Ah, sí, la nacida en el vacío... ¿Sabe? En mi familia usábamos a criaturas como esa como presas en nuestras cacerías. Los mutantes son la perdición de la humanidad, un cáncer invisible que amenaza nuestra propia existencia... pero estoy divagando. En el breve período durante el que Toliman ha ejercido de maestra de vocos, no he detectado ningún defecto personal ni nada que me haga cuestionar sus cualificaciones personales. Es muy diligente, como cualquier otro nacido en el vacío que busca ganarse el afecto de su amo. Creo que puede confiar en sus habilidades y en su lealtad».

languages.text: 「ああ、あの虚空生まれの…ご存知だと思いますが、私の一族では、あのような生物を狩りに赴く際に用いていたのです。変異体は人類の災厄であり、すべてを終わらせる脅威となる目に見えぬ腫瘍なのです…。話が逸れましたね。トリマンがヴォクス・マスターに就任してからしばらくは、彼女の性格には大きな問題はなく、資質を疑うようなこともありませんでした。無論、主人の好意を得ようとする虚空生まれ同様に、彼女は非常に勤勉であることは言うまでもありません。彼女の技術と忠誠心は、信頼に足るものでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Ah, yes, the voidborn... You know, in my family, we used such creatures as quarry whenever we went hunting. Mutants are the bane of Humanity, an unseen tumour that threatens to end us all... But I digress. In the brief time Toliman has spent in post as Vox Master, I have not noticed any significant flaws in her character or anything that would make me question her professional qualities. Needless to say, she is very diligent, as is any voidborn seeking to earn their master's affection. I believe you can trust in her skills and loyalty."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、はい、あの虚空生まれ…ご存知だと思いますが、私の一族では、あのような生物を狩りに赴く際に用いていたのです。変異体は人類の災厄であり、私達すべてを終わらせる脅威となる目に見えぬ腫瘍です。話を変えましょう。トリマンがヴォクスマスターに就任してからしばらくは、彼女の性格には大きな問題がなく、プロフェッショナルとしての資質を疑うようなこともありませんでした。無論、主人の愛情を得ようとする虚空生まれ同様に、彼女は非常に勤勉であるのは言うまでもありません。彼女の技術と忠誠心は、信頼しても良いものでしょう」

languages.text: "Ah, ja, das Kind der Leere ... Wisst Ihr, in meiner Familie waren solche Kreaturen Jagdbeute. Mutanten sind die Geißel der Menschheit, ein unsichtbarer Tumor, der uns alle zu vernichten droht ... Aber ich schweife ab. In der kurzen Zeit, die Toliman als Voxmeisterin Dienst tut, habe ich keine relevanten Charakterfehler oder sonst etwas bemerkt, das mich an ihren professionellen Fähigkeiten zweifeln ließe. Natürlich ist sie überaus dienstbeflissen, wie alle Kinder der Leere, die die Gunst ihres Herrn erringen wollen. Ich denke, Ihr könnt auf ihr Können und ihre Loyalität vertrauen."
languages.original_text: "Ah, yes, the voidborn... You know, in my family, we used such creatures as quarry whenever we went hunting. Mutants are the bane of Humanity, an unseen tumour that threatens to end us all... But I digress. In the brief time Toliman has spent in post as Vox Master, I have not noticed any significant flaws in her character or anything that would make me question her professional qualities. Needless to say, she is very diligent, as is any voidborn seeking to earn their master's affection. I believe you can trust in her skills and loyalty."

Natürlich ist sie überaus dienstbeflissen, wie alle Kinder der Leere, die die Gunst ihres Herrn erringen wollen. Ich denke, Ihr könnt auf ihr Können und ihre Loyalität vertrauen."

languages.text: « Ah, oui, cette hors-monde... Ma famille avait l'habitude d'utiliser ces créatures comme proies lors de nos chasses. Les mutants sont le fléau de l'humanité, une tumeur invisible qui menace notre existence même... Mais je digresse. Depuis sa prise de fonction récente, je n'ai pas décelé de défaut particulier dans la personnalité de la maîtresse-vox Toliman, ni quoi que ce soit d'autre susceptible de remettre en cause ses qualités professionnelles. Il va sans dire qu'elle est très diligente, comme tous ceux de son espèce qui cherchent à gagner l'affection de leur maître. Je pense que vous pouvez vous fier à ses talents ainsi qu'à sa loyauté. »
languages.original_text: "Ah, yes, the voidborn... You know, in my family, we used such creatures as quarry whenever we went hunting. Mutants are the bane of Humanity, an unseen tumour that threatens to end us all... But I digress. In the brief time Toliman has spent in post as Vox Master, I have not noticed any significant flaws in her character or anything that would make me question her professional qualities. Needless to say, she is very diligent, as is any voidborn seeking to earn their master's affection. I believe you can trust in her skills and loyalty."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, oui, cette hors-monde... Ma famille avait l'habitude d'utiliser ces créatures comme proies lors de nos chasses. Les mutants sont le fléau de l'humanité, une tumeur invisible qui menace notre existence même... Mais je digresse. Depuis sa prise de fonction récente, je n'ai pas décelé de défaut particulier dans la personnalité de la maîtresse-vox Toliman, ni quoi que ce soit d'autre susceptible de remettre en cause ses qualités professionnelles. Il va sans dire qu'elle est très diligente, comme tous ceux de son espèce qui cherchent à gagner l'affection de leur maître. Je pense que vous pouvez vous fier à ses talents ainsi qu'à sa loyauté. »

languages.text: "Evet, şu uçsuzdoğan... Bizim ailede ava çıkıldığında onun gibileri av olarak kullanırdık. Mutantlar İnsanlığın belası, hepimizi yok edebilecek görünmez bir tümördür... Neyse, konumuza döneyim. Toliman'ın Voks Üstadı olarak görev yaptığı kısa süre içerisinde karakterinde önemli bir kusur veya mesleki niteliklerini sorgulamama neden olacak herhangi bir şey fark etmedim. Elbette efendisinin sevgisini kazanmak isteyen her uçsuzdoğan gibi o da fazlasıyla gayretkeş. Becerilerine ve sadakatine güvenebileceğinize inanıyorum."
